Actions.Name: Legion's Advance
Actions.Description: All relict may move 1 space in the same direction, ignoring engagement, then may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Turtle Shield
Actions.Description: All adjacent allies gain cover and dodge until the start of the Legionary's next turn. The Legionary becomes immobile and unstoppable for the same duration.

Actions.Name: Merciless Advance
Actions.Description: The Legionary activates Death March three times. It may choose different direction each time.
